title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config & data into a single Modelfile; ships with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async support, streaming, embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; Android-compatible, fluent API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for chatting, model management & prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + ChromaDB to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-dependent pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting streaming chat, embeddings & model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to expose Ollama models in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama HTTP API with GenServer-backed process pools.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on WASM compatibility for browser extensions.
